ingredients.item: 1 x ½ pointed spring cabbage, shredded
1 x ½ x 20g pack dill, chopped

instructions.step: Put the cabbage and onion in a mixing bowl, sprinkle with the salt and pour in the vinegar. Mix together, then leave to stand for 1 hour, tossing occasionally.
Add the sugar, mustard, soured cream, olive oil and most of the dill. Season generously with black pepper, then stir together until everything is well mixed. Scatter with the remaining dill.
